name: NTHCHAIN
description: Launched on May 1st, 2018, NTH Project is a blockchain-based data platform that collects users’ data and provides fair rewards in return. NTH project collects users’ unstructured data (geolocational data) through a mobile smartphone NTH DApp. Users receive rewards - N.Cash - in return for the data that they produce. Once a user accumulates a certain amount of N.Cash, the user can trade in N.Cash for NTH tokens, a function preinstalled in the NTH DApp.
